text:
@NikkiHaley @standamericanow What do you know about Jamaal Khashoggi's death?
How do you feel about trumpublikkklans saying and doing nothing about Putin putting bounties on American soldiers?
What do you say about our #coronavirus response?
137k dead
3.2 million infected with #COVID19
40 mil unemployed
@GOP
